title: Eth Denver Burner Chain
body: Here's a first pass at instructions for interacting with the burner chain.

title: HelloChain Tutorial SecTrustedApplication.h problem with macOS Catalina (10.5.3)
body:
Message: 
note: 'SecTrustedApplicationCreateFromPath' has been explicitly marked deprecated here.

Found a reference to the issue here:   https://github.com/ovrclk/akash/pull/445

I was able to get the project to compile by adding this into the 

go.sum file:
`github.com/99designs/go-keychain v0.0.0-20191008050251-8e49817e8af4 h1:/vQbFIOMbk2FiG/kXiLl8BRyzTWDw7gX/Hz7Dd5eDMs=`
`github.com/99designs/go-keychain v0.0.0-20191008050251-8e49817e8af4/go.mod h1:hN7oaIRCjzsZ2dE+yG5k+rsdt3qcwykqK6HVGcKwsw4=`

go.mod file:
`replace github.com/keybase/go-keychain => github.com/99designs/go-keychain v0.0.0-20191008050251-8e49817e8af4`

After making this modifications I was able to build the project and run the rest of the HelloChain tutorial

title: fix code snippets in all docs

labels.name: nameservice
labels.description: Issues related to the nameservice tutorial

body:
We should replace all code snippets with specific line excerpts like:
```
+++  https://github.com/tendermint/tendermint/blob/bc572217c07b90ad9cee851f193aaa8e9557cbc7/crypto/crypto.go#L22-L27
```

title: Have each chain run in CI
[PROJECT] Provide Issue-Tracking Rules for Project Members
body:
(this affects the overall Cosmos project domain)

## Current Status

Issues are closed too fast

Example: , see #227, #221, #223  (please reopen those issues)

## Expected

### Prime Directive

* Never close an issue in an abrupt manner (e.g. commenting and closing, without even awaiting an reply from the author)
* Issue Authors can be asked to close issues themselves.

### Rules & Rationales

* Decentralization
* Issues which affect Quality-Assurance cannot be closed by the producing team itself.
* ...

title: Scavenge tutorial fixes
body:
* `MsgCommitSolution.go` missing
* combing `cd scavenge` with `cd x`
* vuepress link from keeper to handler doesn't work (link looks correct tho)
* Better to use VI
* tell user to make new working directory outside of `/scaffold` (!!!)
* app page should have make file instead of main.go twice
* Use phony on all targets
* Maybe change `make install` to `make` on run page
* typo on last section of run.md (`scavngD` => `scavengeD`)

title: Simplify Hellochain Tutorial
body:
I landed on a tutorial:

https://tutorials.cosmos.network/hellochain/tutorial/00-intro.html

It starts a bitoverwhelming, like this:

```sh
mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/{ .Username }/hellochain
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/{ .Username }/hellochain
git init
```

which is not very convenient (possibly google's go fault, but still).

## Expected

Simplify this in the way:

### Prerequisites

* Go
* git

### Setup

Within your usual project location:

```sh
mkdir hellochain
cd hellochain
git init
```

title: nameservice export genesis
body: apparently some kind of error in nameservice export genesis. It results in an error about not being able to unmarshall empty bytes. furthermore the nameservice validate genesis functions throws an error if a name contains an empty value. this should not be a error as a name with an empty value should be no problem.

title: add a docker file and init script to start chains

hello, I run the hellochain in my local computer, but I encountered a problem as follows.
-----------
Operation process：
1.create "alice" account and its address is "cosmos1twhnqe0ypjyd09sfkjz3paajlrh828grfhk6z5"
2.create "bob" account and its address is "cosmos1mqf00lkrhu4ca7kyn6gyh4dcg27urxx39qarz7"
3.alice use command "hccli tx greeter say hellom cosmos1mqf00lkrhu4ca7kyn6gyh4dcg27urxx39qarz7 --from alice --chain-id test-chain-zccezZ" to say hello to bob. blockchain access this transaction.
----------

I use command "hccli query greeter list cosmos1twhnqe0ypjyd09sfkjz3paajlrh828grfhk6z5 --chain-id test-chain-zccezZ" to query the recording, but hcd daemon says ERROR as follows.

title: Create own token name in HelloChain tutorial
body:
How to change the name of `hellotoken` and `stake` token names in Hello Chain tutorial, or after we scaffold the application for HelloChain?

I tried changing the name in `genesis.json` before starting the chain, but after that when i do any transaction with `mytoken` (new token name), it says `ERROR: invalid coin expression: 5000mytoken`
